description:
Some schoolboys are making a commotion in front of Tatsumi`s apartment. They leave immediately when Tatsumi calls out to them. Looking down, Tatsumi discovers a conch rolling near his feet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La situation des amis de Wakasa - Maki
The Circumstances of Wakasa`s Friends: Maki Edition
Wakasa no Tomodachi Jijou: Maki Hen
若狭のトモダチ事情・真木編
